This sites takes the name from a famous song attributed to [Cantalicio Luna](https://lesluthiers.org/verpersonaje.php?ID=162) and played by [Les Luthiers](https://lesluthiers.org/titulares.php). 

### _Mi caballo es el mejor aunque a alguno esto le duela_

This is a multilingual website, with contributions in Spanish, English and German as I see fit.

### _Elegante ha de vestir el cantor de serenatas_

This website has been created using [quarto](), and I am continuosly exploring features. Switch between my favourite dark mode and a light mode with the button on the top-right.

### _El caballo en su corral, en su chiquero el chancho_
